Bio.title: Who Am I?
Bio.text: I'm a computer science student with a strong interest in Linux, containerization (Docker, Podman, Kubernetes), and programming (C, C++, Go, Python). I'm passionate about data science, computer security, and web development (Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS). I also have experience with Git, DevOps (GitHub Actions), and game development using Stencyl. I'm always looking to learn more and take on new challenges.
